preqs: PSC3231 Pharmaceutical Product ManufacturePSC3041 Applied Analytical Methods

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSC3041, PSC3231}
(Must be enrolled in course type {09, 09-1, 09-4} and Must be enrolled in course version {3469, P3002})

description: Students will conduct advanced research in formulation field and will apply the knowledge and formulation tools learnt in previous units.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
